metadata.title: CVE-2017-10683 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In mpg123 1.25.0, there is a heap-based buffer over-read in theconvert_latin1 function in libmpg123/id3.c. A crafted input will lead to aremote denial of service attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-10683` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmpg123-0 - 1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1
mpg123 - 1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mpg123 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.22.4-1ubuntu0.1').
